trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONPANDEMONIUM_00000_THEMIS_000_001<tab>This appears to be one of the warders we seek, but I am afraid he is in no state to answer questions. Perhaps you can bring him to his senses...?
TEXT_DUNGEONPANDEMONIUM_00000_ERICHTHONIOS_000_005<tab>Hesperos!? What is the meaning of this?
